entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
